attributes.action: To scrap the proposed Peace and Quiet Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a ridiculous stealth tax and should be scrapped immediately.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HonestTax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
